name: testrun
description: A module to support a test

scripts.test_lab: lab -v test/byplatform.js test/format.js test/lab.js test/lab_async.js test/scriptrun.js test/scriptrun_cmd.js test/lab_skip.js && lab -v test/lab_only.js
scripts.test_mocha: mocha test/mocha.mocha test/mocha_async.mocha test/scriptrun.mocha test/scriptrun_cmd.mocha test/mocha_skip.mocha && mocha test/mocha_only.mocha
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test_lab && npm run test_mocha

author: Takayuki Sato
